Literature.Title: Lipidated Short Analogue of α-Melanocyte Stimulating Hormone Exerts Bactericidal Activity against the Stationary Phase of Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus and Inhibits Biofilm Formation.
Literature.Author: Mumtaz S, Behera S, Mukhopadhyay K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=62.5 µM,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:14.5% Killing=50 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAP 0017(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida albicans 105(MIC=16µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes(MIC=1-2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=11.36µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=11.36µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=11.36µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=11.36µM)
